Welcome to Project Name’s Documentation

This documentation will guide you through the key components of the project.

Sections:

  • Installation: Steps to get exsclaim up and running.

  • Quick Start: A fast-track guide to start using EXSCLAIM2.0.

  • Scrape multimodal data from Nature journal: Information on MOF adsorption for CO2.

  • Scrape multimodal data from PDF files: Details on the peptide hemolytic functionality.

  • Scrape multimodal data from HTML files: Surfactant CMC properties explained.

  • Finetune YOLOv11 for Figure separation: Comparing docking results between GNINA and AutoDock Vina.

  • Microscopy Image retrieval: Explanation of inverse design for specific applications.
